memberdef.name: AMREX_LOOP_3D
memberdef.initializer: { \ const auto amrex_i_lo = amrex::lbound(bx); \ const auto amrex_i_hi = amrex::ubound(bx); \ for (int k = amrex_i_lo.z; k <= amrex_i_hi.z; ++k) { \ for (int j = amrex_i_lo.y; j <= amrex_i_hi.y; ++j) { \ for (int i = amrex_i_lo.x; i <= amrex_i_hi.x; ++i) { \ AMREX_D_PICK(amrex::ignore_unused(j,k),amrex::ignore_unused(k),(void)0); \ block \ }}} \ }

memberdef.name: AMREX_LOOP_4D
memberdef.initializer: { \ const auto amrex_i_lo = amrex::lbound(bx); \ const auto amrex_i_hi = amrex::ubound(bx); \ for (int n = 0; n < ncomp; ++n) { \ for (int k = amrex_i_lo.z; k <= amrex_i_hi.z; ++k) { \ for (int j = amrex_i_lo.y; j <= amrex_i_hi.y; ++j) { \ for (int i = amrex_i_lo.x; i <= amrex_i_hi.x; ++i) { \ AMREX_D_PICK(amrex::ignore_unused(j,k),amrex::ignore_unused(k),(void)0); \ block \ }}}} \ }
